welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Hood, the charming city known for its rich history and military legacy. We invite you to explore and enjoy our beautiful city during your stay. We hope you have a memorable experience here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robert Gray AAF Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Robert Gray AAF Airport is used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Draughon-miller Central Texas Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Draughon-miller Central Texas Regional Airport is available for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
